name: Competitor Analysis
description: Compares your AI visibility and SEO performance against key competitors in your industry.

insights.title: Outperforming on Content Depth
insights.description: Your average content length is 2.3x competitor average, signaling expertise to AI.

insights.title: Growing Market Share
insights.description: Your share of AI mentions increased from 18% to 24% over 3 months.

insights.title: Unique Feature Coverage
insights.description: You're the only competitor with dedicated content on 3 emerging topics.

issues.title: Competitor A Dominates AI Responses
issues.description: Competitor A appears in 78% of AI responses vs your 45%. Significant gap exists.

issues.title: Weaker Backlink Profile
issues.description: Your domain authority (DA 52) lags behind top 3 competitors (DA 65-72).

issues.title: Slower Publishing Cadence
issues.description: Competitors publish 3x more content monthly, capturing more AI training data.

recommendations.description: Identify and create content for 25 high-value keywords where competitors rank but you don't.
Launch outreach campaign targeting competitor backlink sources.
Scale content production to match industry publishing standards.
